data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Telšiai, Lithuania.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Telšiai, Lithuania
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, there are 121,120 people in the state of Telšiai who claim Christianity, but may have never read the Bible. Please challenge them today to read the Bible for themselves.
data.verse: All Scripture is God-breathed and is useful for teaching, rebuking, correcting and training in righteousness

data.section_summary: On average, 18 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next 100 hours in Telšiai, Lithuania.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Lord, we pray for the believers in Telšiai, Lithuania to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the state of Telšiai.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Uzbek, Northern people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Uzbek, Northern people.
Spirit, fill the 2,061 believers in the state of Telšiai with tears, because God is not obeyed by those around them.
data.verse: Streams of tears flow from my eyes, for your law is not obeyed.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up prophets in Telšiai who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Holy Spirit, have mercy on the simple who turned from you in the state of Telšiai. Warn them again against their complacency.
data.verse: For the simple are killed by their turning away, and the complacency of fools destroys them;

location.name: Telšiai
location.people_groups_list: Kazakh, Jew, Karaite, Azerbaijani, Estonian, Tatar
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Kazakh (500), Jew, Karaite (200), Azerbaijani (1,000), Estonian (500), Tatar (2,200)
